FuncDef:
The l2tp lns backup-group command creates an LNS backup group.
The undo l2tp lns backup-group command deletes an LNS backup group.
By default, no LNS backup group is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an LNS backup group.
The value is a string of 1 to 30 characters.

ExtraInfo: In the scenario where 1:1 inter-board backup is configured on the L2TP LNS, run the l2tp lns backup-group command to create an LNS backup group. Then, you can specify the master and slave tunnel boards for the LNS backup group to implement inter-board backup.
